Comments_List: Honestly I'm not really sure what I learned from this class. I didn't take EENG 320 beforehand and boy I wish that I had (it's a prerequisite for a reason lol).

It is really cool to be in the cleanroom (Becton 400) for the labs, but it is such a tedious and repetitive process that gets old after the first of three labs. It is much more time intensive than I expected. And having Professor Ma for 9am slow, dry lectures is not fun. At all.
I think this is much better suited for a graduate student exclusively, or for someone who is extremely self-motivated.
